columns.name: VOUCHER_GID
columns.description: The GID for the voucher.

columns.name: VOUCHER_XID
columns.description: The XID for the voucher.

columns.name: VOUCHER_NUMBER
columns.description: The number of the voucher.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the voucher.

columns.name: WAS_AUTO_APPROVED
columns.description: Contains a Y for yes if the voucher was automatically approved or an N for no if not.

columns.name: APPROVED_BY
columns.description: The name of the person who has approved payment for the voucher.

columns.name: AMOUNT_TO_PAY
columns.description: The dollar amount to be paid for the voucher.

columns.name: AMOUNT_TO_PAY_BASE
columns.description: The amount to pay in base units.

columns.name: AMOUNT_TO_PAY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the amount to pay.

columns.name: TIMESTAMP
columns.description: Time stamp for voucher.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON_GID
columns.description: The adjustment reason GID.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: AMT_TO_PAY_WITH_TAX
columns.description: The Amount to Pay with Tax for the Voucher.

columns.name: AMT_TO_PAY_WITH_TAX_CURR_GID
columns.description: The Unique Currency GID for the Amount to Pay with Tax.

columns.name: AMT_TO_PAY_WITH_TAX_BASE
columns.description: The Base amount for the Amount to Pay with Tax.

columns.name: AMOUNT_TO_PAY_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the amount to pay.

columns.name: AMOUNT_TO_PAY_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the amount to pay.

columns.name: AMT_PAY_W_TAX_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the amount to pay with tax.

columns.name: AMT_PAY_W_TAX_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the amount to pay with tax.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
